creditline: Bequest of Mr. and Mrs. Northrop Dawson, Jr.
description: standing man wearing variously patterned garments in red, grey, blue and white, with a black and white fur lined textile at his PR hip, looking down at a bare-chested heavy-set boy holding an axe over his PL shoulder, with a black and white checked garment tied around his waist; received framed
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Ogura Imitations of One Hundred Poems by One Hundred Poets
title: Poem by Sanjô Udaijin: Kaidômaru and Urabe Suetake
